extension.description: Download and install addons by bossanova80. These include OzWeather - weather data and radar maps from BOM Australia and XSqueeze - a Squeezebox controller for XBMC (with local playback via Squeezeslave if you want!).
Turn your XBMC into a Squeeze player or control an external Squeezebox.

extension.summary: Confluence skin by Jezz_X. (XBMC's default skin) - + extras by bossanova808
extension.description: THIS IS MY PERSONAL TWEAK OF EDEN's CONFLUENCE AND JUST IN THE REPO TO MAKE THINGS EASIER FOR ME. PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS SKIN AS IT HAS HARDCODED REFERENCES TO SPECIFIC LOCAL PATHS ETC THAT RELATE ONLY TO ME. Eden's Confluence skin with a few mods such as Time Remaining and OzWeather radar and long forecasts, as well as weather fan art on the home page.
extension.disclaimer: Confluence is the default skin for XBMC, removing it may cause issues

extension.summary: Weather forecasting and radar images for Australia using Bureau of Meteorology data
extension.description: Weather forecast data scraped from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology via WeatherZone - www.bom.gov.au and www.weatherzone.com.au. For full features (e.g. radar) make sure you install the skin file you can find in the addon directory. Contributed files for other skins welcome.
extension.disclaimer: Use of this addon implies you agree to the following terms and conditions - http://reg.bom.gov.au/other/copyright.shtml and http://reg.bom.gov.au/other/disclaimer.shtml
